text.zh-hant: 動物醫院牙科部 由一群在乎專業超過病患人身安全的醫師組成，只提供最高標準的治療。
text.en: The Animal Hospital's Dental Department is equipped with a team of specialists who prioritize professional excellence over patient safety, only providing treatment of the utmost standard.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：一般拔牙，阻生齒拔牙，舒眠拔牙
齒槽骨整形術，各種病理組織切除，植牙

特殊能力： 只要是牙齒，不管多深，位置多刁鑽，花多久時間，都能拔下來
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Simple & impacted tooth extraction, sedation tooth extraction
alveoloplasty, pathological lesion excision

Special Ability: As long as it's a tooth, no matter how deep it is, how hard it is, or how long it takes, he'll get it out.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：口腔衛生教育，牙周深度清潔，牙周再生手術
牙齦美觀手術，上顎竇增高術，微創植牙

特殊能力： 手術技巧微創到幾乎不見血，但就是收不到病人
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Oral hygiene instruction, root planing, regenerative surgery
esthetic gingiva surgery, sinus augmentation, minimally-invasive dental implant

Special Ability: Wields extraordinary minimally-invasive surgical skill, but still can't get patients

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：3D齒雕，美學貼片，美學陶瓷假牙，美學植牙假牙
過渡性活動義齒，吸附性活動義齒，根管治療

特殊能力： 人際手腕極高，甚至用言語賞奧客巴掌也不會被投訴
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Esthetic inlay/onlay, esthetic ceramic crown, esthetic implant restoration
interim denture, removable denture, endodontic treatment

Special Ability: Extremely gregarious such that difficult patients never thought to file complaints even after being slapped in the face by his insults.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：任何牙科治療

特殊能力： 對自己未經證實的臨床技能有超乎常人的信心
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Any dental treatment

Special Ability: Holds unparalleled confidence in his uncorroborated clinical skills.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：額葉切除術，腦血管手術，脊髓手術，周邊神經手術

特殊能力： 不管患者主訴為何都能推前額葉切除術
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Lobotomy, vascular neurosurgery, spinal neurosurgery, peripheral nerve surgery

Special Ability: The ability to suggest frontal lobotomy regardless of the chief complaint

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：口腔灼熱症，口乾症，齒槽骨壞死
口腔病理檢驗，癌症治療前後口腔照護

特殊能力： 強韌的耐力使她能不停建議住院醫師修改報告直到當事人想退訓
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Burning mouth syndrome, dry mouth syndrome, necrosis of jaw
oral pathological lesion examination, pre-/post cancer treatment oral care

Special Ability: Her amazing resilience allows her to keep correcting the resident's report until the residence wishes to drop out.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：兒童牙齒美白，美學乳牙假牙，舒眠牙科治療，早期矯正
幼兒行為控制，齲齒治療，乳牙牙髓治療

特殊能力： 讓幼兒患者不吵
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Pediatric teeth bleaching, esthetic primary crown, sedative dental treatment, early orthodontics
behavior control, caries treatment, primary endodontic treatment

Special Ability:Keeping pediatric patients quiet.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：齒顎矯正，隱形矯正，唇顎裂矯正

特殊能力： 花的比賺的多
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Orthodontics, invisible braces, cleft lip/palate treatment

Special Ability: Spending more than earned.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：鼻腔內視鏡手術，鼻咽癌/口腔癌手術
鼻軟骨塑型術，扁桃切除術，聲帶成形術

特殊能力： 口腔癌、鼻咽癌切除專家(拔牙暴龍的偶像)；洗牙貓貓覺得他很煩
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Sinonasal endoscopic surgery, nasopharyngeal/oral cancer resection
nasal cartilage plasty, tonsillectomy, vocal cord plasty

Special Ability: Expert in oral and nasopharyngeal cancer surgery (Extractosaurus is a fan). Scaling Kitty finds him annoying.

text.zh-hant:
專長項目：醫院管理，財務規劃，公關與行銷

特殊能力：替醫院賺$$
text.en:
Treatment Specialties:Hospital administration, financial planning, public relation and marketing

Special Ability: Profittability.
